VARDESC: Since the COVID-19 pandemic (March 1, 2020), have you needed to postpone any medical procedures?
In the past month, have you missed any scheduled appointments with any health care provider?
What is the MAIN reason you missed appointments with any healthcare provider in the past month?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'In the past month, have you missed any scheduled appointments with any health care provider?' = 'Yes'
VALUES: 1 = Your clinic cancelled your appointment because of COVID-19
column18: 2 = Your clinic is closed because of the COVID-19
column19: 3 = You had symptoms of COVID-19, so you stayed home
column20: 4 = You cancelled the appointment to avoid being around others
column21: 5 = You cancelled the appointment because you did not want to be in a healthcare setting
column22: 6 = You felt okay or good enough
column23: 7 = You didn't have money or insurance
column24: 8 = You didn't want to take public transportation and had no other way to get there
column25: 9 = You forgot to go/just missed your appointment
column26: 10 = You felt disrespected by the office or medical staff

VARDESC: What is the MAIN reason you missed appointments with any healthcare provider in the past month? Specify:
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'What is the MAIN reason you missed appointments with any healthcare provider in the past month?' = 'Other (specify)'

VARDESC: In the past month, have you missed taking any medications?
What is the MAIN reason you missed taking medications in the past month?
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'In the past month, have you missed taking any medications?' = 'Yes'
VALUES: 1 = You couldn't get your medications because the pharmacy closed
column18: 2 = You couldn't get to the pharmacy because of COVID-19 shutdowns
column19: 3 = You couldn't get to the pharmacy because you wanted to avoid being around others
column20: 4 = You felt good, didn't need your medications
column21: 5 = Your doctor advised you to delay treatment
column22: 6 = You were worried about side effects
column23: 7 = You didn't have money or insurance to get medicine
column24: 8 = You didn't want to take public transport to pick up your prescription and had no other way to get there
column25: 9 = You were drinking or using drugs
column26: 10 = You forgot to take your medications

VARDESC: What is the MAIN reason you missed taking medications in the past month? Specify:
COMMENT1: ASK IF 'What is the MAIN reason you missed taking medications in the past month?' = 'Other, specify'
